nodes.text: Shroomchips were a type of food available in the galaxy by 20 BBY. The Sullustan journalist Den Dhur ate a handful of shroomchips which had been served in a bowl while he was in the cantina run by the Ortolan Baloob in Republic Mobile Surgical Unit 7, which was stationed on the planet Drongar during the Clone Wars.
Shroomchips first appeared in MedStar I: Battle Surgeons, the first novel in the MedStar Duology, written by Michael Reaves and Steve Perry and published in 2004.
